languages.text: "Люди ненавидят {mf|его|ее} — от нижних палуб до старших офицеров. Я слышу их вокс-переговоры. Грядет бунт".
"Everyone — from the lower decks to the senior officers — hate {mf|him|her}. I hear their vox-transmissions. Mutiny is brewing."
languages.original_text: "Люди ненавидят {mf|его|ее} — от нижних палуб до старших офицеров. Я слышу их вокс-переговоры. Грядет бунт".

traits.locale_text: "Everyone — from the lower decks to senior officers — hate {mf|him|her}. I can hear their Vox-transmissions. An uprising is brewing."
"Everyone — from the lower decks to senior officers — hate {mf|him|her}. I can hear their Vox-transmissions. An uprising is brewing."
"Everyone — from the lower decks to the senior officers — hate {mf|him|her}. I hear their vox-transmissions. Mutiny is brewing."
"Everyone — from the lower decks to the senior officers — hate {mf|him|her}. I hear their vox-transmissions. Mutiny is brewing."
"Everyone — from the lower decks to the senior officers — hate {mf|him|her}. I hear their vox-transmissions. Mutiny is brewing."

languages.text: “从底层甲板到高阶军官，没有一个人不痛恨{mf|他|她}。我听到了他们的音阵通话，兵变一触即发。”
languages.original_text: "Everyone — from the lower decks to the senior officers — hate {mf|him|her}. I hear their vox-transmissions. Mutiny is brewing."

traits.locale_text: “从底层甲板到高阶军官，没有一个人不痛恨{mf|他|她}。我听到了他们的音阵通话，兵变一触即发。”

languages.text: «Todo el mundo {mf|lo odia|la odia}, desde las cubiertas inferiores hasta los primeros oficiales. He oído sus vocotransmisiones. Se está gestando un motín».
languages.original_text: "Everyone — from the lower decks to the senior officers — hate {mf|him|her}. I hear their vox-transmissions. Mutiny is brewing."

traits.locale_text: «Todo el mundo {mf|lo odia|la odia}, desde las cubiertas inferiores hasta los primeros oficiales. He oído sus vocotransmisiones. Se está gestando un motín».

languages.text: « Tout le monde, des cosmomarins des ponts inférieurs aux officiers supérieurs, {mf|le|la} déteste. J'entends leurs transmissions-vox. Une mutinerie se prépare. »
languages.original_text: "Everyone — from the lower decks to the senior officers — hate {mf|him|her}. I hear their vox-transmissions. Mutiny is brewing."

traits.locale_text: « Tout le monde, des cosmomarins des ponts inférieurs aux officiers supérieurs, {mf|le|la} déteste. J'entends leurs transmissions-vox. Une mutinerie se prépare. »

languages.text: "Jeder – von den unteren Decke bis zu den höheren Offizieren – hasst {mf|ihn|sie}. Ich habe ihre Voxübertragungen gehört. Da brodelt Meuterei."
languages.original_text: "Everyone — from the lower decks to the senior officers — hate {mf|him|her}. I hear their vox-transmissions. Mutiny is brewing."

traits.locale_text: "Jeder – von den unteren Decke bis zu den höheren Offizieren – hasst {mf|ihn|sie}. Ich habe ihre Voxübertragungen gehört. Da brodelt Meuterei."

languages.text: 「下層デッキから上級士官に至るまで、誰もが陛下を憎んでいます。彼らのヴォクス通信が聞こえます。反乱が起こるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Everyone — from the lower decks to the senior officers — hate {mf|him|her}. I hear their vox-transmissions. Mutiny is brewing."

traits.locale_text: 「下層デッキから上級士官に至るまで、誰もが陛下を憎んでいます。彼らのヴォクス通信が聞こえます。反乱が起こるでしょう」

languages.text: "Alt güvertelerden kıdemli subaylara kadar herkes ondan nefret ediyor. Voks iletilerini duyuyorum. İsyan yaklaşıyor."
languages.original_text: "Everyone — from the lower decks to the senior officers — hate {mf|him|her}. I hear their vox-transmissions. Mutiny is brewing."

traits.locale_text: "Alt güvertelerden kıdemli subaylara kadar herkes ondan nefret ediyor. Voks iletilerini duyuyorum. İsyan yaklaşıyor."
